participant_1.name: Luca
participant_1.personality: I am introspective and enjoy deep conversations. I can be playful and adventurous, especially when it comes to trying new foods.
participant_1.background: I like to think about my childhood. I like to eat mangoes when they're ripe and sweet. I like to play video games. I like eating vegetables. I have moved a lot, but I always take my favorite green clothes with me.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: I am curious and love exploring different cultures. My humor helps me connect with others, even if I sometimes feel out of place.
participant_2.background: I enjoy learning about my father's culture and heritage. I am funny. I am in love with Adam Levine. I hate social obligations because I always say the wrong thing. I love wearing clothes that make me feel like I can take on the world.

content.text: Hey! What do you like to do for fun?
I love learning about my culture and heritage!
I'm half Chinese, half Mexican. You?
I'm actually half Italian, half Filipino!
Oh, cool! My dad's side is from Shanghai, and my mom's side is from Chihuahua.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to visit China.
Me too! I've been to Mexico, but not China yet.
Have you ever been to the Philippines?
Yes, I went to the Philippines for vacation when I was younger.
Oh, that's cool! What was it like?
It was amazing! The food was delicious, and the people were so friendly.
It sounds like you had a great time!
I did! I'm hoping to go back someday.
Me too! Maybe we can go together sometime?
